title: The Courtyard Ambush
visuals: ASCII_Overlay: Threat detection enabled. Targets marked in Red.
lighting: Harsh moonlight through broken skylights. Long shadows.
audio: Ragged breathing through gas masks, the scrape of boots on rubble, distant coughing.
smell: Rust, stagnant water, the chemical tang of old gas residue.
narrative:
Three Hazers block your path to the Admin Wing. They brandish pipes and old pistols.
'Scavengers!' one wheezes. 'You don't take the bodies! We protect the sleep!'
gmNotes: Combat encounter. Jax will plead for non-lethal resolution. His reaction to player choices matters for the ending.

npcs.name: Jaxson 'Jax' V.
npcs.notes: Will shout to spare them. Takes Mental Stress if player kills.
npcs.motivation: Desperate to avoid more death. These are his people, even if they don't know it.
npcs.personality: Panicked, pleading. Will physically try to stop lethal attacks.

npcs.name: Hazer Patrol (x3)
npcs.notes: Physically frail. Dying of the genetic timebomb. They cough when moving fast.
npcs.motivation: Protect the shrine and the 'sleepers' (cryo pods). They think you're scavengers.
npcs.personality: Desperate, territorial, wheezing. They fight because they have nothing left to lose.

npc_stats.name: Hazer Patrol
npc_stats.weakness: They are physically frail. They cough when moving fast.

challenges.description: Convince the Hazers you're not scavengers.

success_effect.text: The lead Hazer lowers his weapon. 'You... you're not with Bio-Dyne?' He coughs. 'Go. But don't touch the sleepers.'

failure_effect.text: The Hazer spits. 'Lies! All outsiders lie!' Combat begins.

challenges.description: Subdue the Hazers without killing them.

success_effect.text: The Hazers are unconscious. Jax checks a pulse and sighs in relief. 'Good. Let's move.'

failure_effect.text: The fight is brutal. You take 1 Stress from the struggle.

success_effect.text: The Hazers fall. Jax stares at the bodies. 'I told you... I told you to stop.' He takes Mental Stress.

failure_effect.text: Even dying, they fight hard. You take 2 Stress.

triggers.label: Jax's Plea
triggers.text: Jax shouts: 'Don't kill them! Just knock them down! We aren't butchers!'

triggers.label: Player Kills
triggers.text: Jax stares at the body. He freezes. 'I told you... I told you to stop.' He takes Mental Stress.

triggers.label: Player Spares
triggers.text: The Hazers are unconscious. Jax checks a pulse and sighs in relief. 'Good. Let's move.'
